title: Flirt Milk
overview: Nomjuet joins the photography club and meets Phra-ek a junior who likes to keep a beard and dresses untidily. One day, Phra-ek brings his favorite camera to help Nomjuet take pictures, but Nomjuet accidentally drops it, rendering it unusable. To repay the camera debt, Nomjuet has to work at Milk Bear Cafe.
